name: motlin-claude-code-plugins
description: Collection of Claude Code plugins for task management, workflow automation, and productivity

plugins.name: markdown-tasks
plugins.description: Task management system using markdown checkboxes in .llm/todo.md with slash commands for planning, implementing, and tracking tasks across git worktrees

plugins.name: tmux
plugins.description: Updates tmux window title with Claude Code status indicators showing current activity (working, editing files, running commands, etc.)

plugins.name: git-worktree
plugins.description: Git worktree management with a slash command to create worktrees with project configuration
